quote: Working with Nirjal Paudel on Upwork was a great experience. His expertise and clear communication made the process efficient, and he delivered backend solutions that met my goals. I highly recommend him as a skilled and professional developer.
author: Sailesg S.

quote: I hired Nirjal to create a new product search and filters for our e-commerce, Nirjal did an amazing job and was very responsive the whole time, Amazing talented developer, I recommend anyone to hire Nirjal for their needs.
author: Adish K. | CEO

quote: I thank Nirjal for his exceptional work developing a robust backend system . I highly recommend his services for anyone in need of professional backend development services.
author: Roshan K. | SEO Director

quote: I highly recommend Nirjal for any backend development project. Their deep expertise in AWS and Django has enabled them to create scalable, secure, and efficient systems. They have an excellent understanding of JavaScript frameworks and bring a level of proficiency with Nest.js that enhances their ability to build maintainable and robust APIs. Throughout our collaboration, Nirjal consistently demonstrated: 1. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to design efficient backend architectures. 2. Mastery in deploying, managing, and scaling applications on AWS. 3. Deep understanding of Django for building fast and secure web applications. 4. Experience in working with Nest.js, showcasing their knowledge in structuring server-side applications with a modular and testable codebase
author: Ayush M. | Frontend Developer Freelancer
